Package pl.polsl.lab.eshopping.model

Class Eshopping

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.polsl.lab.eshopping.model.Eshopping
  • public class Eshopping
extends java.lang.Object
    Class holding all of the model of application clients, baskets, and products

        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Throws:
        MyException - throws exception if price is incorrect (NaN or negative value)

      • addToBasket

        public void addToBasket​(java.lang.String client,
                        Product product)
                 throws MyException
        adds product to client's basket creates new product and adds it to the basket if the basket doesn't contain given product else sets product's amount higher else throws exception if there is no such client
        Parameters:
        client - client which gets the given product added to the basket
        product - product which is added to client's basket
        Throws:
        MyException - throws exception if client doesn't exist

      • findProductIndex

        public java.lang.Integer findProductIndex​(java.util.List<Product> productList,
                                          java.lang.String productName)
        Finds index of given product in list of products and returns it
        Parameters:
        productList - list of products to be searched
        productName - name of product
        Returns:
        product index or null if none was found

      • convertProductToStringList

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> convertProductToStringList​(java.util.ArrayList<Product> productList,
                                                                        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> productNameList)
        adds names of products from given list of products to ArrayList of strings and returns the latter helper function
        Parameters:
        productList - list of products
        productNameList - list of strings to be updated with names of products
        Returns:
        ArrayList of product names or null if initial productNameList not empty or productList is null

      • returnLoggedUser

        public java.lang.String returnLoggedUser()
        finds the key (username) of logged client
        Returns:
        username of client of null if nobody is logged

      • checkAndReturnLogin

        public java.lang.String checkAndReturnLogin​(java.lang.String login,
                                            java.lang.String password)
                                     throws MyException
        Checks if credentials given by user are correct and returns key (username) of client if credentials match else throws exception
        Parameters:
        login - username inputted by user
        password - password inputted by user
        Returns:
        key (username) of client
        Throws:
        MyException - throws exception if there is no such client
